extDescription.message: Watch Lives anonymously. Download saved Live and IGTV. Allows viewing and downloading Stories and IGTV from desktop.

errorZip.message: Error getting Zip file. Most likely you tried to download too many files for your Internet connection speed or computer power. Try to reduce number of files to make it work or try again in few seconds. Sometimes Instagram servers get stuck on a lot of requests.

download_post_live_warning.message: Instagram doesn't support downloading ended lives. But our downloader can do it.

download_post_live_error.message: Error when getting file. Try again a bit later.

post_live_removed.message: This video is no longer available

disconnect_notification.message: Refresh this page to continue using Downloader for Instagram Stories

open_new_tab_for_surfing.message: Open Instagram.com in new tab to continue surfing.

stories_page_live_not_found.message:
Something went wrong.
Story not found

notAuthorizedMsg.message: Please login to your Instagram account

are_you_sure_leave.message: Are You sure You want to leave?

all_your_changes_will_lost.message: All your changes will be lost

upload_from_external_link.message: Allow uploading photo from any other site

allow_only_separately_message.message: Unfortunately Instagram stores ended lives as two separate files: video and audio tracks. That's why you can download them separately and join them in a corresponding service.

separately_by_interrupted.message: Unfortunately automatic downloading complete video is not available due to configuration of your Operating System. You can try again later or download selected Post Live as two separate files (audio and video tracks), and merge them with any tool you prefer.

privacy_watching_msg.message: Keep your privacy when watching Stories here. View status will not be displayed.

extTitle.message:
Download Saved Lives
view Stories from desktop and watch Lives
Stay private when watching Lives and Stories.

trust_us_text.message: When launching downloader you might see the screen like below. To start downloading follow instructions shown in picture.

wb1.message: You are using browser which blocks operation of third-party software. Our extension is not compatible with suspicious Browsers, please use Original Google Chrome Browser and enjoy safe surfing the Net.

wb2.message: We recommend you to remove this suspicious browser and install Official Version of Google Chrome

wb3.message: Please also note that in most cases Browsers installed by your Antivirus software are scumware which jeopardize your safety.
